name: OpenAI GPT
description: Executes a one-off prompt to OpenAI GPT and returns the result
introductoryText:
![OpenAI](data:image/png;base64,)
### GPT Block
#### Executes a one-off prompt request for each row in the input block, and output the results from OpenAI using the desired text generation model

options.name: Model
options.title: Model
options.description: E.g. gpt-3.5-turbo   . The model as per OpenAI API name.

options.name: Prompt
options.title: User Prompt
options.description: Point to the field that contains the prompt to execute
